name: STOP THE SICK!
description:
STOP THE SICK!

A downloadable game for windows.  UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS:  This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022 to meet the theme of Small World. The project was developed in 72 hours with five current level 4 students and one level 6 student.  Game Description: STOP THE SICK! is a strategy-based game where the goal is to defend the player's cell from viruses/bacteria by deploying blood cells. Blood cells can be purchased using proteins collected from destroying the viruses/bacteria. Survive three rounds increasing in difficulty to win. How To Play: Place blockers down to protect the immune system Requirements: Windows PC PC Team Members:  David Adamson (Level 6, Game Development Student)  Rhys Taylor (Level 4, Game Development Student)  Chelsea Jones (Level 4, Game Development Student)   Aidan Herring (Level 4, Cyber Security Student)  Aleah White (Level 4, Computer Science Student)  Owen Hutchinson (Level 4, Computer Science Student)
